price: 175. Woo maray tama weelot weeloysime tirtot maxqawit (mako) xaamiteeh dambi cabtit Yallih digaala xaamite mara kinni, Toysa usun girah Addal Abaanah yanin Sabri manxu gibdi Sabri iy usun gira ken culussa taamah taamiten waqdi !
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَٱلۡعَذَابَ بِٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِۚ فَمَآ أَصۡبَرَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā wal-ʿadhāba bil-maghfirati famā aṣbarahum ʿalā al-nāri
